It belongs to the Araceae family and is characterized by its dark green, leathery, and lance-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, inconspicuous white flowers that are typically hidden beneath its foliage. It thrives in shady, moist environments and is valued for its ornamental foliage. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
